doc.title: Big Ben's Place: Wagyu inside!
doc.text: I/PRP went/VBD down/NN to/TO Big/VB Ben/NN 's/POS Pies/NN last/JJ month/NN with/IN my/PRP$ son/NN only/RB to/TO find/VB that/IN there/RB were/VBD a/DT whole/JJ lot/NN of/IN contractors/NN at/IN the/DT shop/NN who/WP told/VBD me/PRP that/WDT the/DT shop/NN had/VBD changed/JJ owners/NNS !/. My/PRP$ son/NN was/VBD devastated/RB because/IN Big/NNP Ben/NNP 's/POS pies/NNS were/VBD his/PRP$ favorite/NN ./. So/RB ,/, I/PRP updated/VBD on/IN the/DT blog/NN that/IN the/DT shop/NN had/VBD closed/VBD ./. However/RB ,/, a/DT few/JJ weeks/NN later/NN ,/, someone/NN wrote/VBD in/IN to/TO say/VB that/IN Big/NN Ben/NN 's/POS was/VBD still/RB alive/JJ and/CC well/RB !/. So/RB ,/, I/PRP quickly/RB brought/VBN my/PRP$ son/NN down/NN to/TO investigate/VB and/CC lo/NN and/CC behold/VB ,/, not/RB only/RB was/VBD Big/NNP Ben/NNP 's/POS alive/NN and/CC well/RB ,/, it/PRP had/VBD undergone/VBN a/DT makeover/NN and/CC was/VBD now/RB a/DT cosy/JJ little/JJ place/NN that/WDT looked/VBD very/RB much/JJ like/IN a/DT pie/NN shop/NN you/PRP would/MD find/VB in/IN Britain/NN !/.
